message:
Common Problems (And Solutions) When Using Select Elements With Angular.JS

To save you the pain I went through :)
name: Common Problems (And Solutions) When Using Select Elements With Angular.JS
caption: gurustop.net
description: I have been doing Angular.JS in production projects for months, that it did surprise me recently how I haven't used drop-downs in it. Well, I mean how I haven't used them enough to get into several...
